73.name: Things Best Left Behind
73.description: You cleaved an embarrassment from your past.
73.requirement: Complete the norn personal story step "Preserving the Balance," "The Championship Fight," or "The Machine in Action."

97.name: Sylvari Specialty Armors
97.description: An exquisitely noble demeanor, cultivated with care.
97.requirement: Soulbind  unique piece of sylvari cultural armor.

153.name: Master of Overkill
153.description: Overkill? I don't believe in overkill!
153.requirement: Deliver  damage in a single blow.

277.name: Champion Paragon
277.requirement: Win  rated arena game as a guardian.

446.name: Daily Laurel Vendor
446.requirement: Visit a laurel vendor in any of the major cities.

514.name: Monthly Completionist
514.requirement: You completed your daily category multiple times in a month.

570.name: Avenger of the Dispossessed
570.description: Once the Molten menace was eliminated, your allies returned home for closure. According to reports, Rox is visiting the jail in Black Citadel, and Braham is heading to Knut Whitebear's loft.
570.requirement: Followed Up with Rox and Braham

603.name: Southsun Settler Supporter
603.description: Complete Southsun events while affiliated with the settlers.

608.name: Gossip with Lord Faren
608.description: Speak with Lord Faren on Southsun Cove.

651.name: Burn Down The Dragons
651.requirement: Took part in the new Dragon Bash tradition of the immolation of dragon effigies.

653.name: Paper Dragon
653.requirement: You've broken open a legion of dragon piñatas and feasted on the yummy treats inside.

654.name: So Lifelike
654.requirement: You've vanquished legions of holographic minions during Dragon Bash.

655.name: Meet the Hosts
655.requirement: Talk to each of the Lion's Arch Ship's Council and learn about Dragon Bash.

668.name: Caching Out
668.requirement: Discover Aetherblade caches across Tyria and the Mists.

748.name: Gnash All the Blades
748.requirement: Complete daily achievements while supporting Evon Gnashblade.

777.name: Champion of the Council
777.requirement: Represent Lion's Arch in the Crown Pavilion.

858.name: Connoisseur of Pain
858.requirement: Complete Zone 1, Zone 2, and Zone 3 in World 2 in Tribulation Mode.

859.name: Tough Customer, World 2
859.description: You keep these merchants in business.
859.requirement: Visit every World 2 shop in Tribulation Mode.

930.name: Grounded
930.requirement: Don't get hit by the electric floors in the security room.

1223.name: Aftermath Cobweb Cleaner
1223.requirement: Destroy the toxic spider queen's cocoons.

1272.name: Yay, Wintersday Presents II
1272.description: Oooh, I wonder what's in there.

1305.name: Marionette Defender
1305.requirement: Participate in each of the 5 marionette portal defense events.

1316.name: Energy Probe Dismantler
1316.requirement: Destroy energy probes or investigate energy probe wreckage in  different map.

1353.name: Boss Thumper XXIV
1353.requirement: Participate in either the fight against the twisted marionette in Lornar's Pass or the fight against the great jungle wurms on Bloodtide Coast.

1354.name: Boss Thumper XXV
1354.requirement: Participate in either the fight against the twisted marionette in Lornar's Pass or the fight against the great jungle wurms on Bloodtide Coast.

1399.name: Cold Comfort
1399.description: Mission: The Battle for Lion's Arch
1399.requirement: Participate in retaking the eastern rally point.

1421.name: Group Effort III
1421.description: Mission: The Battle for Lion's Arch
1421.requirement: Participate in defeating an enemy champion during the Battle for Lion's Arch.

1710.name: Brewmaster
1710.locked_text: Purchase an Observational Zymology Manual from bartenders in various cities.

1736.name: Acolyte of Dwayna
1736.description:
<c=@flavor>"Give solace and shelter to those who need it. Be ye a salve to the wounded."</c>
—Scriptures of Dwayna, 115 BE
1736.requirement: Prove your piety by collecting all of the vestments of Dwayna.

1793.name: Exposed Weaknesses
1793.requirement: Reduce the health of the facet of darkness from 75% to 0 in less than 15 seconds.

1798.name: Copper
1798.requirement: Defeat Champion Mordrem Husk Copper. Active during The Breach after Pact Assault Preparations has been fully completed.

1850.name: Daily WvW Camp Capturer
1850.requirement: Capture supply camps for your realm in World versus World.

1881.name: Daily Don't Touch the Shiny Minidungeon
1881.requirement: Complete the Don't Touch the Shiny minidungeon in Caledon Forest.

1914.name: Daily Crimson Plateau Jumping Puzzle
1914.requirement: Complete the Crimson Plateau jumping puzzle in Diessa Plateau.

1916.name: Daily Tribulation Rift Jumping Puzzle
1916.requirement: Complete the Tribulation Rift Scaffolding jumping puzzle in Dredgehaunt Cliffs.

1923.name: Daily Weyandt's Revenge Jumping Puzzle
1923.requirement: Complete the Weyandt's Revenge jumping puzzle in Lion's Arch.

1978.name: Daily Maguuma Wastes Miner
1978.description: Fueling the engines of the economy.
1978.requirement: Gather raw materials by mining ore in the following Maguuma Wastes maps: Dry Top and the Silverwastes.

2097.name: Daily Warrior or Necromancer Winner
2097.requirement: Win  PvP match as a warrior or necromancer.

2153.name: Daily Recommended Fractal—Scale 11
2153.requirement: Complete  scale 11 fractal in the Fractals of the Mists through the portal in Lion's Arch.

2212.name: Dragon's Stand Explorer
2212.requirement: Explore all areas in Dragon's Stand.

2229.name: Daily Recommended Fractal—Scale 6
2229.requirement: Complete  scale 6 fractal in the Fractals of the Mists through the portal in Lion's Arch.

2278.name: Sunrise II: The Perfected Daysword
2278.description: Your first attempt at crafting the legendary precursor Dawn has been modestly successful but has not yet yielded the weapon you ultimately desire. This journey has only just begun. Find a teacher, research your procedures, and hone your skills before you try a second time.

bits.text: Speak to a Master Weaponsmith to learn his needs for the war effort.
Speak to a Master Weaponsmith to discover the art of forging.
Speak to a Master Weaponsmith to learn his needs for the war effort.
Speak to a Master Weaponsmith to learn the secret to weighting a blade.
Speak to a Master Weaponsmith to discover the art of forging.
Speak to a Master Weaponsmith to learn his needs for the war effort.
Speak to a Master Weaponsmith to discover the secret to balancing a hilt.
Speak to a Master Weaponsmith to learn the secrets of superior forging tools.

Speak to Scholar Mossi in the Trader's Forum in Lion's Arch to learn her needs for applied research in Jungle Magics.

2364.name: Heart of Thorns Act III Mastery
2364.requirement: Complete all  Heart of Thorns Act III achievements.

2391.name: Meteorlogicus II: The Perfected Scepter
2391.description: Your first attempt at crafting the legendary precursor Storm has been modestly successful but has not yet yielded the weapon you ultimately desire. This journey has only just begun. Find a teacher, research your procedures, and hone your skills before you try a second time.

bits.text: Speak to a Master Artificer to discover the art of magical woodworking.
Speak to a Master Artificer to discover the secret to polishing a scepter core.
Speak to a Master Artificer to discover the art of magical woodworking.
Speak to a Master Artificer to discover the secret to balancing a scepter rod.
Speak to Scholar Mossi in the Trader's Forum in Lion's Arch to learn her needs for applied research in Desert Magics.
Speak to Scholar Mossi in the Trader's Forum in Lion's Arch to learn her needs for applied research in Jungle Magics.
Speak to Scholar Mossi in the Trader's Forum in Lion's Arch to learn her needs for applied research in Old World Magics.
Speak to Scholar Mossi in the Trader's Forum in Lion's Arch to learn her needs for applied research in Ancient Water Magics.
Speak to Scholar Mossi in the Trader's Forum in Lion's Arch to learn her needs for applied research in Stabilizing Magics.
Purchased from Grandmaster Craftsman Hobbs after training the Magister of Legends ability in the Legendary Crafting Mastery Track.

2398.name: Daily Revenant or Warrior Winner
2398.requirement: Win  PvP match as a revenant or warrior.

2429.name: Diarmid Dropper
2429.description: Your machete may not be enough...

2461.name: Scholar's Pack
2461.requirement: Collect all  items to create your Scholar's Pack.
2461.locked_text: On first completion of the story step "Prisoners of the Dragon," choose one of the three order-themed backpacks.

bits.text: Purchased from Itzel vendors for airship parts.
Purchased from Exalted vendors for aurillium.
Purchased from Nuhoch vendors for ley-line crystals.
Complete the story step "Heart of Thorns."

2464.name: Daily Revenant or Guardian Winner
2464.requirement: Win  PvP match as a revenant or guardian.

2471.name: Master Berserker
2471.requirement: Completely train the warrior's berserker elite specialization.

2474.name: Amber Wurmslayer
2474.requirement: Kill the amber head of the great jungle wurm in Bloodtide Coast.

2538.name: "Dragonrender" Strongbox
2538.requirement: Search in the Rooted Copse area for the strongbox from the "Dragonrender."

2593.name: Master Druid
2593.requirement: Completely train the ranger's druid elite specialization.

2614.name: Invisible King
2614.description: Use your mastery skill to spot invasive fungi.
2614.requirement: Find and hit / mushroom king hiding in the lower Tarnished Treetop.

2621.name: Glint's Bastion
2621.requirement: Collect these  items and skins to receive the herald's shield, Glint's Bastion.
2621.locked_text: Begin training the revenant's herald elite specialization.

bits.text: Requires training Stealth Gliding in the Gliding Mastery line.
Earn bronze or better in this adventure.
Purchased from Itzel vendors for airship parts.
Found on ore nodes in Auric Basin. Requires training Exalted Gathering in the Exalted Lore Mastery line.
Defeat a Treasure Mushroom. Requires training Nuhoch Stealth Detection in the Nuhoch Lore Mastery line.
Created from a plated weapon purchased for crystalline ore in Dragon's Stand.

2642.name: Kamohoali'i Kotaki I: The Experimental Spear
2642.description: They move through the sea, silent and remorseless. They are respected and feared for their unrelenting savagery. They are sharks. Consider the place of these great beasts in the world, for good and ill, as you take your first steps in creating the legendary precursor known as Carcharias.
2642.locked_text: Unlock the Mastery ability Revered Antiquarian in the Legendary Crafting Mastery line, and speak to Grandmaster Craftsman Hobbs in Lion's Arch.

bits.text: Pulled from sharks in Bloodtide Coast, Sparkfly Fen, or Mount Maelstrom.
Pulled from sharks in Plains of Ashford, Timberline Falls, Kessex Hills, and Gendarran Fields.
Pulled from sharks in Southsun Cove.
Pulled from ice sharks in Lornar's Pass, Frostgorge Sound, and Fireheart Rise.
Pulled from the risen bull sharks in Orr.
Pulled from the Champion Risen Megalodon in Sparkfly Fen, Straits of Devastation, and Cursed Shore.

2656.name: White Noise
2656.requirement: Kill all of the Vale Divisions within 10 seconds of the first one dying, and then defeat the Vale Guardian.

2718.name: League Guardian—Recruit
2718.description: Completing this achievement advances the League Professional—Recruit achievement.
2718.requirement: Win 5 ranked matches as a guardian.

2761.name: League Ranger—Recruit
2761.description: Completing this achievement advances the League Professional—Recruit achievement.
2761.requirement: Win 5 ranked matches as a ranger.

2772.name: Snowball Fight!
2772.requirement: Claim victory in the Snowball Mayhem activity 3 times during Wintersday.

2784.name: Golden Generosity
2784.requirement: Donate gold to Ho-Ho-Tron in Divinity's Reach.

2899.name: Daily Tier 2 Captain Mai Trin Boss
2899.requirement: Complete Captain Mai Trin Boss at fractal scale 26 or higher.

2910.name: Daily Auric Basin Event Completer
2910.description: Looking for a lost city of gold.
2910.requirement: Complete events in Auric Basin in the Heart of Maguuma.

2918.name: Daily Tier 3 Snowblind
2918.requirement: Complete Snowblind at fractal scale 51 or higher.

2975.name: Daily Adventure: Bugs in the Branches
2975.requirement: Open the bronze daily reward chest from this adventure!

3036.name: Anomalous Results
3036.requirement: Successfully disperse  Ley-Line Anomalies before they overload.

3129.name: Token Collector
3129.description: Have you found all of them?
3129.requirement: Collect all the mursaat tokens that were scattered around Ember Bay.

bits.text: Infernal Cape: On the eastern side of the volcano.
Burning Grotto: In the northern exit of the Furnace Chamber.
Burning Grotto: In the northern exit of the Furnace Chamber.
Burning Grotto: Hidden in a crevice in the back of the Furnace Chamber.
Smoldering Inlet: On the rocks northeast of the Magma Outlet.
Lava Flats: At the source of the Lava River.
Fractured Caldera: To the northeast of Quickk's Retreat.
Smoldering Inlet: Between rock shelfs in the mouth of the Magma Outlet.
Caliph's Steps: Under a rock shelf on the western beach.
Burning Grotto: Within the top shelf of the Furnace Chamber.
Smoldering Inlet: Near the peninsula in the inlet, within a small underwater cave.
Osprey Pillars: On the southwestern area, in the basaltic pillar underbelly.
Performance Field: look for a crack in the wall in the Sloth Queen's quarters.
Infernal Cape: Within a magma fall on the northwestern side of the volcano.
Fractured Caldera: On the upper rock-shelf tiers of the western side.
Infernal Cape: Under the volcano, hidden underwater.
Skritt Anchorage: At the highest point of the Dread Shiny.
Burning Grotto: Within the outer rock shelfs on the southern side.
Burning Grotto: Under the Furnace Chamber on the southeastern side.
Caliph's Steps: Next to the magma fall at the sealed entrance.
Bleeding Pulpit: Hiding in the north outer wall of the Pedestal of Flames.
Fractured Caldera: Along the riverbed of the magma outlet.
Sopor Titanum: Within the walls of the easternmost part of the volcano.
Sopor Titanum: Within the walls of the easternmost part of the volcano.
Sopor Titanum: Hidden within the outer walls of the inner magma falls on the north side of Chalice of Tears.
Shipwrecked Beach: On top of the highest rock spire next to Ivy's Circus Spectacular.
Infernal Cape: On the horns at the top of the volcano.
Shipwrecked Beach: Somewhere in someone's messy hut within Ivy's Circus Spectacular.
Sopor Titanum: Within the terrifying walls of the eastern side of the inner chamber.
Skritt Anchorage: Within the walls of Rock Face Scratch.
Sopor Titanum: Drop down the southern part toward Titan's Perch.
Caliph's Steps: On the third shelf up to the northwest of the Sealed Entrance.
Caliph's Steps: On an upper tier of a large room to the northeast of the Sealed Entrance.
Caliph's Steps: Look within some orifices on the Twin Skulls.
Burning Grotto: Under another rock shelf within the southeastern waters under the Furnace Chamber.
Burning Grotto: Hidden within the upper rock tier of Furnace Chamber on the eastern side.
Burning Grotto: Hidden within the outer rock walls of the Furnace Chamber to the northwest of the magma pool.
Caliph's Steps: Look within the rocks between the two Twin Skulls.
Bleeding Pulpit: Between the rocks where Destruction's Maw and Pedestal of Flames meet on the northern side.
Ashen Skerries: Look among the karka eggs in the Karka Hatchery.

3137.name: Cami's Final Voyage
3137.description: I wouldn't want to be in her shoes.
3137.requirement: Collect Cami's journal entries around Ember Bay.

bits.text: Infernal Cape: look around the tip of the peninsula.
Shipwreck Beach: northwest of the cursed circus, buried in rocks after the beach labyrinth.
Bleeding Pulpit: located northeast of the bubbling caldera.
Lava Flats: Slipped under rock overhangs in the pool area.
Basalt Rise: below the largest rock outcrop east of the vista.
Sopor Titanum: Hidden directly west under the second staircase within the ruins.

3177.name: Daily Tier 4 Nightmare
3177.requirement: Complete Nightmare at fractal scale 76 or higher.

3284.name: Lake Doric Insight: Melandru's Refuge
3284.requirement: Discover this Maguuma Mastery Insight in Lake Doric.

3291.name: Kyhlo Defender
3291.requirement: Defeat  enemy while defending your team's capture points during Battle of Kyhlo rated matches.

3377.name: Lake Doric Insight: Melandru's Flourish
3377.requirement: Discover this Maguuma Mastery Insight in Lake Doric.

3510.name: Fearful
3510.description:
Story Instance: Shining Blade Secrets

"Get away! Get away!"
3510.requirement: Defeat the Manifestation of Self-Doubt in the Shining Blade headquarters by using Minor Breakthrough for help.

3527.name: Storyteller: Grenth
3527.requirement: Find all the pages of the Parable of Grenth.

bits.text: Resting above the tunnel in Grenth's Reliquary.
Washed away by the Tears of Orr.
Sharing the same space as the first parable of Grenth.
By the tree that feeds on the Tears of Orr.
Embedded in the stone that sits at the edge of the depths.

3568.name: Damage Control
3568.requirement: Destroy the Forged catapults attacking Diviner's Reach.

3594.name: Lost Lore of Desert Highlands
3594.requirement: Collect all the pages to complete the book.

bits.text: Inside the Tomb of Primeval Kings.
On the cliffs overlooking the Auburn Hills.
Atop the ledge dividing the Brightwater Inlet and Salt Flats.
Next to the giants' fire on the Windshear Scarps.
Perched in the griffon's roost above Fortune's Vale.
In the lava waterfall in Fortune's Vale.
Where the harpies gather in Brightwater Inlet.

3612.name: Desolation Explorer
3612.description: You've explored the treacherous and bleak landscape known as the Desolation.
3612.requirement: Explore all areas in the Desolation.

3643.name: Kaadsseo the Wise
3643.requirement: Successfully answer all of the riddles posed by the air djinn Kaadsseo the Wise.

3698.name: Clogged Drain
3698.requirement: Defeat Archon Iberu without ever letting him drain.

3809.name: Dogs of War
3809.requirement: Successfully defeat the legendary hounds Tegon and Temar in the Foundry.

3838.name: Adept Scourge
3838.requirement: Begin training the necromancer's scourge elite specialization.

3842.name: Raise the Banners: Amnoon Arbitrator
3842.description: You explored all possible paths for Amnoon to take in its time of crisis.
3842.requirement: Collect all  items to unlock this piece of equipment.

3880.name: Daily Desert Lumberer
3880.description: Fueling the engines of the economy.
3880.requirement: Gather raw materials by harvesting trees in the following locations: Crystal Oasis, the Desert Highlands, Elon Riverlands, the Desolation, or the Domain of Vabbi.

3889.name: Academy Supply Run: Gold
3889.requirement: Earn a gold medal in the Academy Supply Run adventure.

3905.name: Hero of the Desert
3905.requirement: Complete events in the Crystal Desert region.

3986.name: Gone Swimming
3986.requirement: Find the diving goggles in Fahranur, and dive into the Eternal Reservoir.

4002.name: Electric City
4002.description: Story Instance: Eye of the Brandstorm
4002.requirement: Repel the Branded from the Free City of Amnoon in under 12 minutes.

4009.name: Convincing the Corsair
4009.requirement: Travel to the flotilla and negotiate your terms with the Corsair captain.

4080.name: (Annual) New Year's Resolution
4080.requirement: Complete the race event or time trial adventure in Divinity's Reach during Lunar New Year in under 5 minutes and 30 seconds without using a mount. This achievement can be completed once a year.

4131.name: Awake End
4131.requirement: Stop Commander Lonai from killing and Awakening any of the citizens of Divinity's Reach.

4137.name: Gate-Crasher
4137.requirement: Reach the tracking network hub quickly, without provoking the Inquest.

4255.name: Domain of Kourna Insight: Bokoss Prison Ruins
4255.requirement: Discover this Mastery Insight in the Domain of Kourna.

4265.name: Beetle Juice
4265.description: Acquire the enhancements necessary to pump your roller beetle to the max!

bits.text: Obtain a Bottle of Bubbling Liquid from a secret cache around Kodonur's Crossing.
Obtain "Dragon" Protein from a secret cache around Kodonur's Crossing.
Obtain Completely Legal Performance-Enhancing Serum from a secret cache around Kodonur's Crossing.
Obtain the Flask of Churning Liquid from a secret cache somewhere near Palawa's Benevolence.
Obtain 210 Proof Rotgut from a secret cache somewhere near Palawa's Benevolence.
Obtain a sample of Calcified Megalodon Fin from a secret cache somewhere near Palawa's Benevolence.
Obtain a bottle of dark smoke from a secret cache around Bitterfly Bayou.
Obtain lightning in a bottle from a secret cache around Bitterfly Bayou.
Obtain an untested speed serum from a secret cache around Bitterfly Bayou.
Return to Gorrik with all of the beetle medicines.

4288.name: Boss Blitz: Beat Boom-Boom
4288.requirement: Defeat Boom-Boom Baines during a Boss Blitz event in the Crown Pavilion.

4312.name: Aspect Gatherer
4312.requirement: Collect  sky crystal in the Labyrinthine Cliffs.

4373.name: Fragments I Have Shored
4373.description: Signs of the Sunspears' past may be scattered among the ruins.
4373.requirement: Activate all the hidden symbols in Sun's Refuge within the time limit.

4386.name: Jahai Insight: Harpy Rock
4386.requirement: Discover this Mastery Insight in Jahai Bluffs.

4405.name: Jahai Insight: Talon of the Dragon
4405.requirement: Discover this Mastery Insight in Jahai Bluffs.

4482.name: Daily Rolling Racer
4482.requirement: Complete the 3 daily roller-beetle race achievements.

4516.name: Nature Loves a Vacuum
4516.requirement: Clean up oil spills on the ice floe.

4596.name: Odds and Ends
4596.requirement: Correctly predict tournament outcomes in the barracks.

4662.name: Skyscale Reflexes
4662.requirement: Play catch with your skyscale in Sun's Refuge.

bits.text: Complete the catch minigame on easy. Interact with the ball in Sun's Refuge to play.
Complete the catch minigame on medium. Interact with the ball in Sun's Refuge to play.
Complete the catch minigame on hard. Interact with the ball in Sun's Refuge to play.

4812.name: Holo Wrangler
4812.requirement: Participate in a Hologram Stampede event.

4928.name: Smooth as Ice
4928.requirement: Defeat the final boss of the Shiverpeaks Pass Strike Mission within the time limit.

4930.name: Daily Grothmar Codebreaker
4930.requirement: Break the code to find what is hidden.

4999.name: Mercy of the Mad King
4999.description: Opening a thousand bags and expecting different contents may be madness, but after all, this is a realm of chaos.

5008.name: Daily Trial of Koda
5008.requirement: Complete a Trial of Koda event in Bjora Marches.

5208.name: Ryland Steelcatcher's Footsteps
5208.requirement:
Collect items related to Ryland Steelcatcher's history to earn his signature Steel Warband flamesaw.
<c=@reminder>Requires access to previous Icebrood Saga episodes to complete.</c>

bits.text: Found inside an Emissary Chest in the Eye of the North after completing a Steel Warband vision.
Found in Eye of the North.
Found outside the Citadel of Flame entrance in Fireheart Rise.
Found in the chest at the end of the Shiverpeaks Pass Strike Mission in Grothmar Valley.
Found in the river near the training grounds in Grothmar Valley.
Purchased from a Rally Provisioner in Grothmar Valley.
Found by completing any event in Grothmar Valley.
Found in Ashford Forum in Plains of Ashford.
Found in the chest at the end of the Tears of Itlaocol in Caledon Forest.
Chance to drop from icebrood enemies. Guaranteed from the Claw of Jormag.
Crafted or purchased from the Black Lion Trading Post.
Drops from bears in Blazeridge Steppes.
Assist Ryland during the Forging Steel vision by defeating the Ancient Forgeman.
Purchased from Fahrtak Shatterfiend near the Brokentooth Maw waypoint in Blazeridge Steppes.
Found after defeating the Whisper of Jormag Strike Mission.
Found inside an Emissary Chest in Eye of the North after opening it with three crystals.

5274.name: Special Mission: This Forest Needs More Bugs
5274.requirement: Repair  listening devices in the Drizzlewood Coast.
5274.locked_text: Unlock by using Ash Legion Special Mission Documents.

5320.name: Special Mission: Iron Rain
5320.requirement: Protect Iron Legion builders as they construct mortars at the fortress or port.
5320.locked_text: Unlock by using Iron Legion Special Mission Documents.

5321.name: Daily Drizzlewood Coast Cache Hunter
5321.requirement: Defeat a cache keeper in Drizzlewood Coast.

5333.name: Drizzlewood Coast Insight: Camp Apex
5333.requirement: Discover this Icebrood Saga Mastery Insight in the Drizzlewood Coast.

5343.name: League Slayer—Conquest Season Twenty-Two
5343.requirement: Defeat  players in ranked matches during Conquest Season Twenty-Two.

5373.name: Eternal Forged Weapon Collection
5373.requirement: Unlock all  Eternal Forged weapon skins in your wardrobe.

5494.name: Pleasant Present
5494.requirement: Bring Rama a gift for the gathering.

5588.name: Daily Lake Doric Dragon Response Mission
5588.requirement: Complete the Lake Doric Dragon Response Mission.

5639.name: League Slayer—Conquest Season Twenty-Six
5639.requirement: Defeat  players in ranked matches during Conquest Season Twenty-Six.

5647.name: Master of Draconic Fire
5647.requirement: Unlock  Fiery Dragon Slayer weapon skin in your wardrobe.

5675.name: Choya Response Mission
5675.description: Note: This achievement functions on the honor system.
5675.requirement: While under the effects of the Choya Elixir, slay as many dragons or dragon minions as you can. Then, and only then, report your accomplishments to the choya sage in Lion's Arch.

5749.name: Woodland Management: Lake Doric
5749.requirement: Log wood  times in Lake Doric.

5809.name: Return to Discovering Scarlet's Breakthrough
5809.requirement: Complete the mission Discovering Scarlet's Breakthrough in Living World Season 2 Episode 2.

5909.name: Revenge of the Wrathbringer
5909.requirement: Defeat the Wrathbringer during the Thunderhead Keep meta-event.

5913.name: Return to Behind Enemy Lines
5913.requirement: Complete the story mission Behind Enemy Lines in Living World Icebrood Saga Episode 4.

6030.name: Magical Weapon Collection
6030.requirement: Unlock all  Magical weapon skins in your wardrobe.

6053.name: League Conqueror—3v3 Season Five
6053.requirement: Win  ranked matches during 3v3 Season Five.

6111.name: Cod Swimming Amongst Mere Minnows
6111.description: You can fish your whole life without understanding it was never the fish you were truly after.

6117.name: Abyssal Dive
6117.requirement: Use the diving goggles near a hidden Aetherblade camp.

6168.name: Ministry-Approved Specter
6168.requirement: Purchase these  trinkets from the strike rewards vendor.

6169.name: Master Catalyst
6169.requirement: Completely train the elementalist's catalyst elite specialization.

6218.name: Intervention
6218.requirement: Take out the chapter boss in the alloted time.

6277.name: Seitung Province Insight: Northern Cherry Blossom
6277.requirement: Discover this End of Dragons Mastery Insight in Seitung Province.

6304.name: Daily End of Dragons Lumberer
6304.description: Fueling the engines of the economy.
6304.requirement: Gather raw materials by harvesting trees in the following locations: Seitung Province, New Kaineng City, Echovald Wilds, or Dragon's End.

6374.name: Daily New Kaineng Jade Brotherhood Slayer
6374.requirement: Kill 25 Jade Brotherhood in New Kaineng.

6382.name: Echovald Wilds Insight: Wrightstone Chantry
6382.requirement: Discover this End of Dragons Mastery Insight in the Echovald Wilds.

6395.name: Dragon's End Insight: Quarry Crane
6395.requirement: Discover this End of Dragons Mastery Insight in Dragon's End.

6426.name: Master Vindicator
6426.requirement: Completely train the revenant's vindicator elite specialization.

6438.name: A Real Hero
6438.requirement: Stand strong against the waves of Void.

6516.name: Sled Defender
6516.description: Event: Stop Void Corrupters from contaminating the jade shipment.
6516.requirement: Keep all 3 Xunlai Jade sleds from being completely contaminated by Void corruption.

6521.name: Pet the Dog
6521.requirement: Pet dogs in the Lion's Arch plaza.

6580.name: Dodging Attacks III
6580.requirement:
Dodge  incoming attack from enemies.

<c=@reminder>Dodging allows you to evade incoming attacks by spending endurance to roll out of danger, making you temporarily invulnerable. "Evaded!" will appear over your character when you successfully dodge an attack.</c>

6591.name: Discovering Points of Interest in the Ruins of Orr
6591.requirement: Discover 5 points of interest in the Ruins of Orr, Frostgorge Sound, or Southsun Cove.

6627.name: Dodging Attacks V
6627.requirement:
Dodge  incoming attack from enemies.

<c=@reminder>Dodging allows you to evade incoming attacks by spending endurance to roll out of danger, making you temporarily invulnerable. "Evaded!" will appear over your character when you successfully dodge an attack.</c>

6638.name: Applying Conditions
6638.requirement:
Apply  conditions to enemies.

<c=@reminder>Conditions are negative effects that apply damage and control effects in combat. Check the tooltip for your skills to determine if your attacks can apply conditions to enemies.</c>

6642.name: Transmuting Skins
6642.requirement:
Transmute  item.

<c=@reminder>Transmutation expends transmutation charges to replace the skin of a piece of equipment with a different one from your account wardrobe. Transmutation charges can be found in daily reward chests, earned by completing maps, or purchased from the Gem Store.</c>

6816.name: Snow Garden Weapon Collection
6816.requirement: Unlock all  Snow Garden weapon skins in your wardrobe.

6827.name: (Weekly) Invader Incinerator
6827.requirement: Defeat enemy invaders in the Mists.

6954.name: League Participator—3v3 Season Nine
6954.requirement: Play  ranked matches during 3v3 Season Nine.

6967.name: Legendary Weapon: The Moot
6967.requirement: Craft the legendary weapon The Moot.

7054.name: Amnytas Explorer
7054.description: You've explored the spacious colleges of Amnytas.

7082.name: Arcane Osmogrifier
7082.description:
An esoteric artifact of a bygone age, it was originally designed to transfer essence past emotional blockages via constant and gradual microtransmutations.

It was shattered and discarded when someone asked the inventor, "Why don't you just tell them how you feel instead?"
7082.requirement: Collect  fragments of the arcane osmogrifier from arcane chests. Greater arcane chests will contain more fragments.

7097.name: Wizard's Tower: Skyscale Target Practice—Gold
7097.requirement: Earn a gold medal in the Wizard's Tower: Skyscale Target Practice adventure.

7114.name: Horn of Maguuma Fisher
7114.description: <c=@flavor>The charm of fishing is in pursuing something elusive, though attainable. It is a simple yet profound practice of hope.</c>
7114.requirement: Collect  different fish from the waterways around the Horn of Maguuma.

7209.name: Amnytas Insight: The Arboretum
7209.requirement: Discover this Secrets of the Obscure Mastery Insight in Amnytas.

7285.name: Dungeon Delver: The Ruined City of Arah
7285.requirement: Complete any path of the Ruined City of Arah dungeon.

7363.name: Black Lion Stolen Goods Recovery Event Week 1—Full
7363.description: The Black Lion Trading Company needs your help collecting stolen goods!
7363.requirement: Collect stolen Black Lion supplies from thieving skritt during the event.

7367.name: Fractal Rush Entrant
7367.requirement: Speak with the Fractal Rush coordinator to learn about the event and its rewards.

7379.name: Don't Think Twice
7379.description: Instead of pondering that orb, leave it up to chance and do the thing.
7379.requirement: Use /ponder by the large orb at Wizard's Ascent.

7730.name: Heitor Instigator
7730.requirement: Use the /beckon emote in front of Heitor's Gate.

7810.name: Artisan of Arms: Warrior's Staff
7810.description: Warriors provide frontline support to their allies with healing and protection.
7810.requirement: Defeat enemies with a staff as a warrior.

7832.name: A Record of War: Knowledge
7832.requirement: Complete various tasks throughout Nayos and earn the banner of the Bastion of Knowledge.

bits.text: Speak with Archivist Morwyn and learn more about the history of Nayos.
Speak with Epaphros in Nyedra and learn what it's like for the Kryptis to fight their own.

7833.name: Precision Anxiety
7833.requirement: Complete the Cosmic Observatory Strike Mission with challenge mode active and with all players being possessed by Residual Anxiety exactly one time and having survived.

7884.name: Fabled Shadow
7884.requirement: Win  rated arena game as a thief.

7920.name: Fabled Phantom
7920.description: Walking the line between life and death—your life, their death.
7920.requirement: Win  rated arena game as a necromancer.

7930.name: Ultimate Legionnaire
7930.requirement: Win  rated arena game as a warrior.

7980.name: Kryptis Caretaker
7980.description: Descending spire: good. Descending health: bad.
7980.requirement: During the "Descend the Spire of Redemption" event, prevent Peitha's health from dropping below 80%.

7986.name: Convergence Challenge Mode—Hell Sister: Gold
7986.requirement: Earn gold-rank timing in a Convergence with challenge mode active for this legendary creature.

8061.name: The Staff of the Obscure
8061.requirement: Watch the entirety of the Secrets of the Obscure credits. Thank you for playing!

8072.name: Kodash Veteran
8072.requirement: Purchase and use a corresponding world title.

8074.name: Isle of Janthir Veteran
8074.requirement: Purchase and use a corresponding world title.

8300.name: Light Up the Vale
8300.description: Light up the path, lest you slip!
8300.requirement: Complete the Vale Brazier jumping puzzle.

8328.name: Build-a-Quaggan: Gather Plant Fibers
8328.requirement: Gather plant fibers suitable for stuffed toys.
8328.locked_text: Locked until you progress the collection.

8394.name: Reliving Path of Fire
8394.requirement: Complete pivotal story missions from Path of Fire.

bits.text: Hallowed Ground: Tomb of Primeval Kings
Enemy of My Enemy: The Troopmarshal
Enemy of My Enemy: The Beastmarshal

8442.name: Klobjarne Geirr: Raid or Convergence Victories
8442.description: This achievement can be reset by purchasing Recollection of Bearkin's Victories to acquire additional copies of the reward.
8442.requirement: Complete Janthir Wilds Convergences or Raids. Raids will grant more progress.
8442.locked_text: Purchase the item Recollection of Bearkin's Victories from a vendor in Maul Boneyards in Lowland Shore.

8468.name: Any Information Is Good Information
8468.requirement: Speak with the other Durmand Priory members about Farrah and Sestina.

bits.text: Talk to the priory arcanist by the stairs.
Talk to the priory arcanist in the hallway entrance.
Talk to the priory arcanist on the balcony.

8499.name: Raid Mentor: Greer
8499.description: A good wayfinder is a practiced guide, mentor, and friend.
8499.requirement: Help  players defeat Greer for the first time.

8549.name: Home Sweet Homestead: Jahai Bluffs
8549.description: We'll find you new hope. And homesteads. Come, walk with me.
8549.requirement:
Complete events in Jahai Bluffs. Group events will award more progress.

Earn bonus progress by completing the "Stop 'Joko' from recruiting the Awakened" event.

8568.name: Hazardous Research: Bronze
8568.requirement: Earn a bronze medal in the Hazardous Research adventure.

8598.name: Magister
8598.description:
This title can be purchased from Shiny King M'takk in Hooligan's Route in Lion's Arch if you meet the requirements. 

Surely it must be an official title if a self-proclaimed skritt king gives it to you, right?
8598.requirement: Purchase and use a corresponding title.

8634.name: A Job for Warclaws
8634.requirement: Find all of the lost scouts in the Search-and-Rescue Challenge without dismounting your warclaw.

8688.name: Rolling Competitor: Jormag's Fang (Weekly)
8688.requirement: Complete laps of the roller beetle race in Snowden Drifts. The final lap of a race event rewards extra progress. (This achievement can be completed in the race event or adventure.)

8705.name: Echo Evader
8705.requirement: Defeat Lextalion without being hit by the Haunting Echoes shock wave more than 9 times.

8776.name: (Weekly) Challenge Mode Convergences: Mount Balrior
8776.requirement: Successfully complete  unique Weekly Convergence: Mount Balrior with challenge mode active.

8778.name: Unceasing Whispers
8778.description: Relive it again. Perhaps this time will be different.
8778.requirement: Complete the Kinfall fractal in challenge mode 7 times.

8793.name: Daily Rift Hunts
8793.requirement: Complete  rift hunting events in any region featuring them.
